title: Acid Mage
data:
The **Acid Mage** is a [role](/wiki/Role "Role") specific to [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"). They are a spellcaster class, and can be neutral or chaotic [doppelgänger](/wiki/Doppelganger_\(starting_race\) "Doppelganger (starting race)"), [drow](/wiki/Drow_\(starting_race\) "Drow (starting race)"), [elves](/wiki/Elf_\(starting_race\) "Elf (starting race)"), [humans](/wiki/Human_\(starting_race\) "Human (starting race)"), [illithids](/wiki/Illithid_\(starting_race\) "Illithid (starting race)"), [incantifiers](/wiki/Incantifier "Incantifier"), or [orcs](/wiki/Orc_\(starting_race\) "Orc (starting race)").

An Acid Mage starts the game with equipment and abilities related to acid magic, including [acid resistance](/wiki/Acid_resistance "Acid resistance"). Their starting pet is an [acid hound pup](/index.php?title=Acid_hound_pup\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Acid hound pup (page does not exist)").

The [Acid Mage quest](/wiki/Acid_Mage_quest "Acid Mage quest") sees you fighting [Lightningrod](/index.php?title=Lightningrod\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Lightningrod (page does not exist)") for the [Flute of Slime](/index.php?title=Flute_of_Slime\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Flute of Slime (page does not exist)"); their first sacrifice gift is [Acidfall](/index.php?title=Acidfall\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Acidfall (page does not exist)"), a neutral athame with +5 to-hit and +5 acid damage.

[ ]

- [9 References](#References)

## Starting Equipment

- a [blessed](/wiki/Blessed "Blessed") +1 [quarterstaff](/wiki/Quarterstaff "Quarterstaff")
- an [uncursed](/wiki/Uncursed "Uncursed") +0 [studded leather armor](/wiki/Studded_leather_armor "Studded leather armor")
- 2 uncursed [food rations](/wiki/Food_ration "Food ration")
- a random scroll
- a random potion
- a random ring
- a [wand of acid](/wiki/Wand_of_acid "Wand of acid")
- a [spellbook of acid sphere](/index.php?title=Spellbook_of_acid_sphere\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Spellbook of acid sphere (page does not exist)")
- a [spellbook of acid stream](/wiki/Spellbook_of_acid_stream "Spellbook of acid stream") (special spell)
- an equal chance of a [spellbook of confuse monster](/wiki/Spellbook_of_confuse_monster "Spellbook of confuse monster") or a [spellbook of sleep](/wiki/Spellbook_of_sleep "Spellbook of sleep")
- a [blindfold](/wiki/Blindfold "Blindfold") (80%), an [oil lamp](/wiki/Oil_lamp "Oil lamp") (16%), or a [magic marker](/wiki/Magic_marker "Magic marker") (4%)

## Techniques

Acid mages gain [techniques](/wiki/Technique "Technique") at these [experience levels](/wiki/Experience_level "Experience level"):

- XL 1 : [reinforce memory](/wiki/Reinforce_memory "Reinforce memory")
- XL 3 : [power surge](/wiki/Power_surge "Power surge")
- XL 5 : [draw energy](/wiki/Draw_energy "Draw energy")
- XL 7 : [sigil of control](/wiki/Sigil_of_control "Sigil of control")
- XL 10 : [sigil of tempest](/wiki/Sigil_of_tempest "Sigil of tempest")
- XL 20 : [sigil of discharge](/wiki/Sigil_of_discharge "Sigil of discharge")

## Intrinsics

- XL 1: [Acid resistance](/wiki/Acid_resistance "Acid resistance")

## Skills

| Acid Mage Skills |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| ---------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Max              | Skills                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| Basic            | - *Weapons:* [polearms](/wiki/Polearms "Polearms"), [spear](/wiki/Spear "Spear"), [javelin](/wiki/Javelin "Javelin"), [trident](/wiki/Trident "Trident"), [lance](/wiki/Lance "Lance"), [whip](/wiki/Whip "Whip")
- *Spellcasting*: [attack spells](/wiki/Attack_spells "Attack spells"), [divination spells](/wiki/Divination_spells "Divination spells"), [body spells](/wiki/Body_spells "Body spells")                                                                   |
| Skilled          | * *Weapons:* [knife](/wiki/Knife "Knife"), [long sword](/wiki/Long_sword "Long sword"), [quarterstaff](/wiki/Quarterstaff "Quarterstaff"), [unicorn horn](/wiki/Unicorn_horn "Unicorn horn")
* *Spellcasting*: [healing spells](/wiki/Healing_spells "Healing spells"), [protection spells](/wiki/Protection_spells "Protection spells")
*  *Combat*: [riding](/wiki/Riding "Riding"), [twoweapon](/wiki/Twoweapon "Twoweapon"), [bare hands](/wiki/Bare_hands "Bare hands") |
| Expert           | - *Weapons:* [dagger](/wiki/Dagger "Dagger")
- *Spellcasting:* [enchantment spells](/wiki/Enchantment_spells "Enchantment spells"), [matter spells](/wiki/Matter_spells "Matter spells")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |

## Gods

- *Main article: [Religion](/wiki/Religion "Religion")*

* Lawful: Tartarica
* Neutral: Acetica
* Chaotic: Hydrocloria (*sic*)

## Acid Mage rank titles

The [status line](/wiki/Status_line "Status line") shows you to be one of the following ranks when you reach the specified experience level:

- XL 1-2: Oozer
- XL 3-5: Slimer
- XL 6-9: Sludge Mage
- XL 10-13: Spiller
- XL 14-17: Corroder
- XL 18-21: Acidsplasher
- XL 22-25: Dissolver
- XL 26-29: Dissolver
- XL 30: Acid-Master

## Strategy

The Acid Mage is a battlemage similar to the flame/ice/electric mage, with the main difference being that they specialize in acid magic. Their starting pet is also acid resistant, making it much safer to use acid spells/wands. Upon leveling up enough, the acid hound pup will grow into an adult [acid hound](/wiki/Acid_hound "Acid hound") which is very strong and capable of taking down lots of enemies. Compared to the other elemental mages, acid mages are at an advantage intrinsic-wise since acid resistance is otherwise very hard to obtain; however, their starting wand cannot burn permanent [Elbereths](/wiki/Elbereth "Elbereth").

The [Acid Mage quest](/wiki/Acid_Mage_quest "Acid Mage quest") mainly spawns [drow](/wiki/Drow "Drow") and [titans](/wiki/Titan "Titan"), and there are lots of pre-placed spellcasters as well, making it one of the harder quests in the game. Beating the [Lightningrod](/index.php?title=Lightningrod\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Lightningrod (page does not exist)") quest nemesis quickly is recommended since the quest goal level has obnoxious [titans](/wiki/Titan "Titan") hiding behind non-diggable walls, and they can freely summon monsters and cast other spells while the player is running around. However, the Lightningrod also moves very slowly and starts out surrounded by sessile monsters that are hard to take out.

## Origin

The Acid Mage is an acid-based pendant to [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM")'s [flame](/wiki/Flame_mage "Flame mage") and [ice mages](/wiki/Ice_mage "Ice mage").

Acid Mage

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

The Acid Mage is a role specific to SlashTHEM. They are a spellcaster class, and can be neutral or chaotic doppelgänger, drow, elves, humans, illithids, incantifiers, or orcs.

An Acid Mage starts the game with equipment and abilities related to acid magic, including acid resistance. Their starting pet is an acid hound pup.

The Acid Mage quest sees you fighting Lightningrod for the Flute of Slime; their first sacrifice gift is Acidfall, a neutral athame with +5 to-hit and +5 acid damage.

Strategy

The Acid Mage is a battlemage similar to the flame/ice/electric mage, with the main difference being that they specialize in acid magic. Their starting pet is also acid resistant, making it much safer to use acid spells/wands. Upon leveling up enough, the acid hound pup will grow into an adult acid hound which is very strong and capable of taking down lots of enemies. Compared to the other elemental mages, acid mages are at an advantage intrinsic-wise since acid resistance is otherwise very hard to obtain; however, their starting wand cannot burn permanent Elbereths.

The Acid Mage quest mainly spawns drow and titans, and there are lots of pre-placed spellcasters as well, making it one of the harder quests in the game. Beating the Lightningrod quest nemesis quickly is recommended since the quest goal level has obnoxious titans hiding behind non-diggable walls, and they can freely summon monsters and cast other spells while the player is running around. However, the Lightningrod also moves very slowly and starts out surrounded by sessile monsters that are hard to take out.

Origin

The Acid Mage is an acid-based pendant to SLASH'EM's flame and ice mages.
